video.title: The Killer Speaks
video.synopsis: Actual convicted murderers -- including spree killers, serial killers and domestic violence killers -- describe their crimes in bone-chilling detail.

episodes.synopsis: For 23-year-old Levi King, his execution of two innocent neighbors provided him with an escape from his life-long inner rage for the first time.
episodes.title: Ice Cold: Levi King

episodes.synopsis: Maksim Gelman began his killing spree by stabbing his stepfather 55 times. Twenty-eight hours later four people had died and four more were wounded.
episodes.title: Mad Maks: Maksim Gelman

episodes.synopsis: Robert Lopez, who served 10 years for nearly killing his lover, takes fatal revenge on a new girlfriend when he thinks she has betrayed him.
episodes.title: Monster Inside: Robert Lopez

episodes.synopsis: Dena Riley and her boyfriend, a convicted rapist, discover they share a perverted sexual fantasy -- three-way sex followed by murder.
episodes.title: Twisted Love: Dena Riley

episodes.synopsis: After killing two people in cold blood at a friend's house, Earl Forrest ambushed the deputies who came to arrest him.
episodes.title: Payback: Earl Forrest

episodes.synopsis: A 51-year-old former corrections officer is found dead in Great Falls, Montana, marking the city's second random murder in six weeks.
episodes.title: Devil Inside

episodes.synopsis: When a skull is found in the woods, a perfect murder begins to unravel, but the trail goes cold until a career criminal makes a surprising confession.
episodes.title: Timothy Thomason: Perfect Murder

episodes.synopsis: When the pregnant girlfriend of a pro football player is shot four times and left for dead, investigators learn they're dealing with a gun for hire.
episodes.title: Van Brett Watkins: Hitman

episodes.synopsis: A drifter who went on a brutal killing spree spanning three states and left his victims with a bizarre signature reveals his motives from death row.
episodes.title: Gary Ray Bowles: The I-95 Killer

episodes.synopsis: When a young man is shot in cold blood and left to die on a mountain trail, detectives hunt for the murderer, who now shares shocking revelations.
episodes.title: Lawrence Tarbert: Natural Born Killer
